summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 DODGE MAGNUM. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 15V313000 (AIR BAGS) AND STATED THAT THE PART WAS NOT AVAILABLE WITHIN A REASONABLE TIME FRAME TO SCHEDULE THE RECALL REPAIR. THE CONTACT HAD TO CONTACT THE MANUFACTURER FOR MONTHS TO BE REFERRED TO ANOTHER DEALER WHO REPAIRED THE VEHICLE BEYOND A REASONABLE TIME FRAME. THE CONTACT WAS NOT EXPERIENCING A FAILURE.   UPDATED 04/06/16*LJ  UPDATED 04/12/16. *JB
